result.error.remediation: Change the recovery model property of database Philips.HIF.ConfigurationEx to full on the SQL host vmtstphiliibe01.rsvgnw.local. Steps: 1. After connecting to the instance MSSQLSERVER of the SQL server, in Object Explorer, click the server name to expand the server tree. 2. Expand 'Databases', and select the database. 3. Right-click the database, and then click 'Properties', which opens the 'Database Properties' dialog box. 4. In the 'Select a page' pane, click 'Options'. 5. The current recovery model is displayed in the recovery model list box. 6. To change the recovery model to full, select full from the drop-down menu. 7. Click OK.
